For anyone wondering about KTO (Kerbin To Orbit) I ;D

Idea: Sun Probe

Mission: Fly in a low Kerbol (sun) orbit and relay pictures and info. back to Kerbin and provide comms for further deep space missions.
Hmm interesting idea for next update.

hello,

I'd like a 1 manned stable "hovercraft" that I can use on the Mun. Something that will get me a little bit off the surface and let me get around and explore without becoming too unstable. Please feel free to use whatever mod packs you want. MechJeb would be a plus.

Could you design a boat that can get from the runway to the water and that looks like the ship from kerbals at war

Mods aloud

Damned robotics
